Name: Hiragana Katakana Ninja
About the game: Description This game complements your Japanese language studies by offering a fun way to fixate the Hiragana and Katakana syllabaries. You play as a Ninja and your mission is to strike the opposing Ninja carrying the correct banner. Can you master all three paths ? Once you lock in your answer, don't forget to use your Ninja invisibility to avoid striking the wrong Ninja! Includes Three game modes: Hiragana, Katakana and Hiragana & Katakana Ninja Invisibility Over 200 syllables for you to master A streak of 10 correct answers will earn you another life Reinvigorate your Japanese learning today and become the true Hiragana Katakana Ninja!
